member.name: CreateBitmapFromWicBitmap.CreateBitmapFromWicBitmap
member.summary: Creates an by copying the specified Microsoft Windows Imaging Component (WIC) bitmap.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a pointer to the new bitmap. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
